name: Crazy Sushi Roll
description:
Take the sushi roll and fight against gravity by moving it up the hill by tilting the device.

Don't think that it's too easy... it's not a smooth ride. Make sure you avoid the holes and other obstacles!

Features:
* Great for Kids or Adults
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
